com.tversity.airflinger.sdk.android.assets
Class MediaObject

java.lang.Object
  com.tversity.airflinger.sdk.android.assets.MediaObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
MediaContainer, MediaItem
public class MediaObject
extends java.lang.Object

A media item.
Objects of this type are fetched from a local device using the LocalMediaProvider, or from a remote media server by a call to Server.browseChildren().

Nested Class Summary
static interface MediaObject.IBitmapCallback
          This interface represents a asynchronous callback that returns a Bitmap object.
static class MediaObject.MediaObjectNameComparator
          A comparator for MediaObject objects
static class MediaObject.MediaObjectType
          Defines the possible types of a media item
